name: NH Token Security Manager
description: The NH Token Security Manager is a fully verified smart contract on Polygon Mainnet (https://polygonscan.com/address/0xf930cf4150f7cb1108b30df610f07188fd794398) providing advanced security features: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) protection, TimeLock (24-hour delay for sensitive operations), Anti-bot protection, withdrawal rate limits, and fully verified source code.
